SELECT b.boardIdx, c.categoryIdx, c.name, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.hit, b.regdate, b.moddate, f.fileIdx, f.originalName, f.fileSize, f.boardIdx, co.commentIdx, co.writer, co.password, co.content, co.regDate, co.boardIdx FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_category c ON b.categoryIdx = c.categoryIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON b.boardIdx = f.boardIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_comment co ON b.boardIdx = co.boardIdx WHERE
DATE(b.regDate) >= DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{searchCondition.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) AND
DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{searchCondition.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) >= DATE(b.regDate) AND
b.categoryIdx = #{searchCondition.categoryIdx} AND
(b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition.keyword}, '%') OR b.writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition.keyword}, '%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition.keyword}, '%')) AND
1=1 ORDER BY b.boardIdx DESC LIMIT #{page.recordStartIndex}, #{page.recordsPerPage}

SELECT b.boardIdx, c.categoryIdx, c.name, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.password, b.hit, b.regdate, b.moddate, f.fileIdx, f.originalName, f.fileSize, f.boardIdx, co.commentIdx, co.writer, co.password, co.content, co.regDate, co.boardIdx FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_category c ON b.categoryIdx = c.categoryIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON b.boardIdx = f.boardIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_comment co ON b.boardIdx = co.boardIdx WHERE b.boardIdx = #{boardIdx};

SELECT count(boardIdx) FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_category c ON b.categoryIdx = c.categoryIdx WHERE
DATE(b.regDate) >= DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{searchCondition.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) AND
DATE(DATE_FORMAT(#{searchCondition.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) >= DATE(b.regDate) AND
b.categoryIdx = #{searchCondition.categoryIdx} AND
(b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition.keyword}, '%') OR b.writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition.keyword}, '%') OR b.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition.keyword}, '%')) AND
1=1
